summary: A few songs to replace the main menu music in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][size=6][color=#C0504D][font=Impact]Main Menu Music Replacer[/font][/color]
[/size]
  This mod replaces the music that plays when you launch Skyrim. After years of playing Skyrim, I wanted to change the old menu song. There's 3 options.
[/size]
[line][youtube]kTE9UibRhnA[/youtube][youtube]jTNxgWJfCv4[/youtube]
[youtube]cqX7S3n7c04[/youtube]
[line]

[size=4][color=#C0504D][size=5][font=Impact]Disclamer:[/font][/size][/color]
[/size]
  I have no rights to any of these images or songs. If you like them, please support the artists who made these amazing pieces of work. If any of the credited artists has a problem with this please message me and I will take whatever it is down. If I forgot somebody in the credits list, please let me know.  I wish to support these artists and their work, and I posted this mod as a way of sharing this work with no monetary benefit for myself whatsoever.

[line]
[color=#C0504D][font=Impact][size=5]Installation:[/size][/font][/color]
[list]
[*]Click Install NMM
[/list]       or[list]
[*]Drop files into data folder in your installation directory.
[/list][b][color=#C0504D][font=Impact][size=5][line][/size][/font][/color][/b][color=#C0504D][font=Impact][size=5]Required Mods: [/size][/font][/color][b]
[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69261/?][s]My Valkyrie Themed Main Menu Image Replacer Mod[/s][/url]  ... None[b]

[/b][line][b]
[/b][size=3][color=#C0504D][font=Impact][size=5]Bugs:[/size][/font][/color] [/size]
[s][/s]None

[line]
[color=#C0504D][font=Impact][size=5]Compatibility: [/size][/font][/color]
Shouldn't conflict with any mods that don't replace the main menu music.

[line]
[color=#C0504D][size=5][font=Impact]Credits:[/font][/size][/color]
[list]
[*]Bethesda Softworks LLC ( [url=http://bethesda.net/en/dashboard]Bathesda[/url] )
[*]Ivan Torrent - Icarus ( [url=https://www.amazon.com/Icarus-feat-Julie-Elven/dp/B00AOHHP7U/]Buy Here[/url] - Amazon )
[*]Peter Roe - This is My World ( [url=https://www.amazon.com/dp/B017HJ0Y48/ref=dm_ws_tlw_trk3]Buy Here[/url] - Amazon)
[*]Iron Score - Endless Battle ( [url=https://soundcloud.com/user-618515763]Soundcloud[/url] )
[*]ReyeD33 - Glory of Icarus ( [url=http://reyed33.deviantart.com/]ReyeD33 [/url]- DeviantArt)
[/list]
author: Supatroopa95
